name: Saad Lamjarred
description: '''Saad Bachir Lamjarred''' ({{langx|ar|سعد بشير لمجرد}}; born 7 April 1985) is a Moroccan singer, songwriter, actor, multi-instrumentalist, dancer, and record producer. He is widely known for his music video "[[LM3ALLEM]]" which received over 1 billion views on [[YouTube]], making it the [[List of most-viewed Arabic music videos on YouTube|most-viewed Arabic music video on YouTube]].
